name: The Hero (eGameTouch)
description:
The hero is a free endless survival 2D shooter mobile game, you can play our game now and experience its amazing game play and visuals, are you ready to be the next hero?

Our game has an endless gameplay, you can spend your whole day playing our game and you'll never get bored because there is always new levels and enemies, it's literally endless!

Our game has 3 difficulties, from the easy mode to the hard mode! Whenever you get used to a difficulty, you can go for the higher one, and we bet you won't be able to play our hard mode! Because we have a very powerful AI based enemies!

Also our game controls is built very well to give you the most smooth gameplay ever and the most entertaining experience by our talented game developers! 

Our art style is very amazing, with a perfect visual effects, you'll feel that the game is alive!

Also you'll be able to buy and upgrade your weapons and max health without paying a real money!

I hope you enjoy your gameplay experience!
